alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:57AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Marshall, northwestern Polk, south central Kittson, central Grand Forks, north central Traill and southeastern Walsh Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 757 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stephen to near Manvel to 6 miles southwest of Emerado. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Florian and Tabor around 815 AM CDT. Holmes and East Grand Forks around 825 AM CDT. Old Mill State Park, Mallory and Key West around 830 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Grand Forks Airport. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 125 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Traill
